meaning_str.bing:
n. 错误；失策；失误；误会
v. 误会；误解；误认；弄错
网络. 过失；差错

错误；过失；（言语或行为上的）失误；（用词或数字等上的）口误；误解；差错；疏忽；失策；误判
误解；误会；把…误认为；错认；看错；弄错；搞错；误判

sogou-kaoyan.v/n: 犯错; 错误[出现8次)];误会[出现0次)]

sogou-CET6.v/n: 犯错; 错误[出现12次)];误会[出现2次)]

sogou-CET4.v/n: 犯错; 错误[出现22次)];误会[出现2次)]

1.en: Turning to my husband, I confessed that I wanted to check out his work computer, so I could reassure my parents they'd made a mistake.
1.cn: 我忏悔我想看看他的工作电脑，这样我可以保证我的父母犯了一个错误。

2.en: Tai, ah, you cast a big mistake, our hearts how much pain ah!
2.cn: 太康啊，你铸下了大错，我们心中是多么痛苦啊！

3.en: My last lap should have been a bit better, but I made a mistake in turn 12, locking the rear under braking.
3.cn: 我的最后一圈本来能更好一些，但我在12号弯出错了，刹车制动时锁死了前轮。

0.en: You don't see your mistake, do you? There's no mistake.
0.cn: 你还没发现自己的错误，是吗？根本就没错误。

1.en: I won't make the same mistake you did.
1.cn: 我不会跟你犯同样的错误。

2.en: Hiring you was the worst mistake I have ever made.
2.cn: 雇佣你是我犯过的最愚蠢的错误

3.en: I've made a horrible mistake. What are you talking about?
3.cn: 我犯了个神蠢的错误。你说啥?

4.en: I don't wanna make the same mistake with you, Donald.
4.cn: 我不想对你犯同样的错误，唐纳德。

5.en: I don't know what you're thinking, but it's a mistake. What's a mistake?
5.cn: 我不知道你在想什么，但这是个错误。什么是个错误？

6.en: That was the biggest mistake of his life. He knew that.
6.cn: 这是他一生最大的错误。他清楚这一点。

7.en: Yes, that was a mistake. Ghastly. What were they thinking of? Probably something about trying to make friends.
7.cn: 是啊，那是个错误。严重错误。他们都在想啥啊? 很可能是交朋友之类的吧。

8.en: No. Not that I was aware anyway. What a colossal mistake.
8.cn: 不是吧，至少我没有感觉到。这是一个巨大的错误。

9.en: He said you bullied him into it. That he thought it was a mistake.
9.cn: 他说是你逼他趟这趟浑水的。他认为这是个错误的决定。

10.en: So, I understand that you actually discovered this element by mistake. Yes.
10.cn: 我听说你是因为一个错误而发现的这个元素。是的。

11.en: This was such a huge mistake. I can't tell him Phoebe. I can't, I can't. Rachel.
11.cn: 这是个天大的错误，菲比，我不敢告诉他。瑞秋…

12.en: And it's the same mistake that shows up four times in Robbie's reviews on Silk Road.
12.cn: 同样的错误在罗比给丝路的评价里出现了四次。

13.en: I think this is a mistake. You're chasing him. Let me work with Israel.
13.cn: 我觉得这是个错误，你这是追他。让我去做以色列的工作。

14.en: A mistake? What were you trying to put it in? Her purse? Where did he put it?
14.cn: 错误？你放到哪里去了？她的皮包里？他放到哪里了？

15.en: It just happened. Alicia. Staying is a mistake. You'll always be under Will.
15.cn: 事情很突然，艾丽西娅留下是个错误，你将永远是威尔的下属。

16.en: Negative reinforcement is the removal of a positive stimulus. It's a common mistake.
16.cn: 负强化是指取消正面刺激[奖励]，这是个常见的错误。

17.en: I thought this was supposed to be about you, not us. The whole thing was a mistake.
17.cn: 我以为这书是关于你的，而不是我们。这一切就是个错误。

18.en: My big mistake in betting on a depression gave me a healthy fear of being wrong. In other words, it gave me deep humility, which was exactly what I needed.
18.cn: 我在萧条中犯下的错误让我对错误有了健康的恐惧。换句话来说它让我非常谦卑，我正需要这一点。

19.en: When the virus gets through, the cell recognizes its mistake. An enemy is inside!
19.cn: 当病毒在里面了以后，细胞认识到它犯的错误。敌人到里面来了！
